name: Capability Statement for AICCELERATE Health Data Store
description: This is the Capability Statement for AICCELERATE Health Data Store within the scope of H2020 AICCELERATE EU Project and its pilot scenarios.

software.name: onFhir.io - HL7 based secure health data repository

rest.documentation: All the functionality defined in FHIR related with AICCELERATE scenarios

security.description: This is the Capability Statement to declare that the server supports SMART-on-FHIR. See the SMART-on-FHIR docs for the extension that would go with such a server

searchParam.documentation: Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for the location

searchParam.name: address-use
searchParam.documentation: A use code specified in an address

searchParam.name: near
searchParam.documentation:
Search for locations where the location.position is near to, or within a specified distance of, the provided coordinates expressed as [latitude]|[longitude]|[distance]|[units] (using the WGS84 datum, see notes).
If the units are omitted, then kms should be assumed. If the distance is omitted, then the server can use its own discretion as to what distances should be considered near (and units are irrelevant)

Servers may search using various techniques that might have differing accuracies, depending on implementation efficiency.

Requires the near-distance parameter to be provided also

searchParam.name: address-city
searchParam.documentation: A city specified in an address

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: Searches for locations with a specific kind of status
